com.iplanet.dpro.session

Class TokenRestrictionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iplanet.dpro.session.TokenRestrictionFactory

  • public class TokenRestrictionFactory
extends Object
    Factory for creating TokenRestriction instances.

      • createNoOpTokenRestriction

      • createDNOrIPAddressListTokenRestriction

        public DNOrIPAddressListTokenRestriction createDNOrIPAddressListTokenRestriction(String dn,
                                                                                 Set<String> hostNames)
                                                                          throws UnknownHostException,
                                                                                 SSOException,
                                                                                 SMSException
        Create a new instance of DNOrIPAddressListTokenRestriction, which handles the restriction of the DN or IPAddress.
        Parameters:
        dn - the DN of the user.
        hostNames - the list of host names.
        Returns:
        a new instance of DNOrIPAddressListTokenRestriction.
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if the host cannot be resolved.
        SSOException - if the single sign on token is invalid or expired.
        SMSException - if an error occurred while trying to perform the operation.
